oai_dc:dc.dc:title: US officers belt plate
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: US officers belt plate of Lt. Samuel Swafford, Co. D, 7th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA. Swafford joined the regiment in April 1865 to fill a vacancy for lieutenant in Company D. He was discharged in July 1865. The 7th Tenn. Mtd. Inf. Regt., USA spent most of the war in and around Athens, Tennessee patroling for guerrillas, occupying the town, and guarding passes through the mountain chain.
